headerDisplay: [homebridge-lacrosseweb](https://github.com/jhschuster/homebridge-lacrosseweb) is a Homebridge plugin to interact with La Crosse Alerts temperature/humidity sensors.
footerDisplay: For additional help please see the [developer page](https://github.com/jhschuster/homebridge-lacrosseweb).

apiBaseURL.title: Lacrosse URL
apiBaseURL.description: Base URL of La Crosse Alerts Mobile website

noResponseMinutes.title: Not Responding Time
noResponseMinutes.description: Number of minutes of no data after which device is considered non-responsive

allowBadSSL.title: Allow Bad SSL
allowBadSSL.description: Allow connections to hosts with bad certificates.

form.title: Advanced Settings (Optional)
